title: WaveSpeed AI - Remove Backgrounds from Images Instantly

hero.heading: Seamlessly Remove Backgrounds from Your Images
hero.description: Effortlessly transform your photos by removing backgrounds with a single click.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Remove the background from this photo...

examples.heading: Background Removal Examples
examples.description: Experience the powerful capabilities of our background remover with stunning before and after images.

items.title: Clear Backgrounds
items.imageAlt: Example showing background removal from a photo

items.title: Isolate Subjects

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI for Background Removal?
features.description: Our cutting-edge AI technology eliminates backgrounds with exceptional accuracy and speed.

items.title: Rapid Results
items.description: Achieve stunning results in seconds with our state-of-the-art AI algorithms.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: No need for technical expertise. Upload your image and let our AI handle the rest.

items.title: Privacy Protected
items.description: Images are processed directly in your browser, ensuring your photos remain private.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Follow these three easy steps to effortlessly remove backgrounds

items.title: Upload Your Image
items.description: Drag and drop your image or browse files. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI-Powered Processing
items.description: Our intelligent AI identifies and removes backgrounds while enhancing the quality of your image.

items.title: Download Your New Image
items.description: View the transformation and download your edited image in high resolution.

testimonial.heading: Hear from Our Users
testimonial.description: Discover how our background remover has made a difference for users everywhere

items.name: Emily Davis
items.comment: Removing backgrounds has never been easier! This tool saved me tons of time on my graphic designs.

items.name: James Smith
items.comment: As a small business owner, I love how I can create professional images for marketing materials. It’s a game-changer.

items.name: Kate Brown
items.comment: The ability to process images right in my browser without uploading them is a huge plus for me. Highly recommend!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about our background removal feature

items.title: What types of backgrounds can WaveSpeed remove?
items.description: Our AI can effectively remove a variety of backgrounds, including complex patterns, objects, and colors, allowing your subject to stand out effortlessly.

items.title: Is the background remover free to use?
items.description: Yes! You can use our background removal tool with 30 free credits daily. Earn more through engagement or explore subscription plans for additional features.

items.title: Can I use images for commercial purposes?
items.description: Users on subscription plans can freely use the edited images for commercial projects. Free users may use them for personal use only.

items.title: How is my privacy secured during processing?
items.description: All processing happens in your browser without uploading your images to servers, ensuring high privacy and security. Data is cleared once you close the tab.

footer.heading: Ready to Remove Backgrounds from Your Images?
footer.description: Try our powerful background remover today and see the difference instantly. No sign-up necessary.
